title: Cannot build qt5 due to fonts
body:
Couldn't build qt-5.9.1 on my system and figured I'd try it with new versions:

     version('5.10.0', 'c5e275ab0ed7ee61d0f4b82cd471770d')
     version('5.9.3',  'eae2435509493a2084405714e0a9bdf9')

No better. Dug through the build output and it was first choking on `-system-freetype` and after hacking around that, it was choking on `-fontconfig`. It's still chugging away (I have lots building today), but these hacks seem to have helped:

    @@ -209,8 +210,8 @@ class Qt(Package):
                 '-confirm-license',
                 '-openssl-linked',
                 '-optimized-qmake',
    -            '-fontconfig',
    -            '-system-freetype',
    +            ## NO '-fontconfig',
    +            ## NO '-system-freetype',
                 '-I{0}/freetype2'.format(self.spec['freetype'].prefix.include),
                 '-no-pch'
             ]

Not the most conclusive issue report, but thought I'd raise it anyhow. It looks like @adamjstewart or @davydden are the ones who might know what's going on here.

Cheers,
/mark
